claim: Sully ignored the National Transportation Safety Board.
premise_source_doc_sentence: The National Transportation Safety Board  (  NTSB  )  is an independent U.S. government investigative agency responsible for civil transportation accident investigation .

claim: Sully ignored the National Transportation Safety Board.
premise_source_doc_sentence: In this role , the NTSB investigates and reports on aviation accidents and incidents , certain types of highway crashes , ship and marine accidents , pipeline incidents , and railroad accidents .

claim: Sully ignored the National Transportation Safety Board.
premise_source_doc_sentence: When requested , the NTSB will assist the military and foreign governments with accident investigation .

claim: Sully ignored the National Transportation Safety Board.
premise_source_doc_sentence: The National Transportation Safety Board evaluated the performance characteristics of the DC-9-14 airplane following an abrupt loss of power from the right engine in the takeoff phase of flight and found the airplane to be docile , easily controllable , and requiring no unusual pilot skills or strength .
